pullrequest.title: Move FindODE.cmake to ign-cmake from ign-physics

content.raw: Sorry, I had to remove my approval, because I realized there's one last thing that needs to change. `ODE_LIBRARY` needs to be renamed to `ODE_LIBRARIES` so that it is compatible with the `ign_import_target(ODE)` macro. The macro assumes that the library variable will be named `<PACKAGE>_LIBRARIES`.
content.html: Sorry, I had to remove my approval, because I realized there's one last thing that needs to change. ODE_LIBRARY needs to be renamed to ODE_LIBRARIES so that it is compatible with the ign_import_target(ODE) macro. The macro assumes that the library variable will be named <PACKAGE>_LIBRARIES.
